member.name: T:Sitecore.Processing.Engine.Projection.DataRow
member.summary: An implementation of that stores its data in a byte buffer for efficient wire transfer.

member.name: F:Sitecore.Processing.Engine.Projection.DataRow.BitsPerLong
member.summary: The number of bits in a long (int64). Bitvectors are added to the row representation if it has nullable fields. These bitvectors are one or more int64s, the first 64 nullable fields have their flag in the first int64, the next 64 in the next int64, etc.

member.summary: Gets the size in bytes occupied in the buffer by this row.

member.name: T:Sitecore.Processing.Engine.Projection.DataRowKeyComparer
member.summary: Compares s by their key fields in the order they are defined in the . Rows compared using this comparer must have the same schemas. Otherwise the result is undefined.

member.name: T:Sitecore.Processing.Engine.Projection.RowSchema
member.summary: Defines the fields and their types for s. A schema consists of zero or more keys, attributes and measures. When aggregated, rows are grouped by keys and measures are summed for each key. Composite keys are allowed. Attributes can contain values of any type but rows are not grouped by these. Attribute values must be unique per key, but can be ommitted from the key to improve performance if a unique key is already present. Measures can only be numeric types and are summed by key.

member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.summary: Gets the attributes defined in this schema.

member.summary: Gets the fields defined in this schema.

member.summary: Gets the count of nullable fields.

member.name: P:Sitecore.Processing.Engine.Projection.RowSchema.RootTableSize
member.summary: Gets the size in bytes of the root table in a s binary representation. This is the minimum size of a datarow with this schema, and the offset for object data.
member.value: The size of the root table in bytes.

member.name: P:Sitecore.Processing.Engine.Projection.RowSchema.FieldOffsets
member.summary: Gets the field offsets in bytes in a s binary representation.

member.name: P:Sitecore.Processing.Engine.Projection.RowSchema.NullOffsets
member.summary: Gets the index of the field in the list of nullable fields, or -1 if the field is not nullable. This corresponds to the bit index in null flag bytes of the data row.

member.summary: Gets the index of the field with the name specified.
